prop.caption: columns
prop.description: a comma seperated list of column sizes. A column size can be specified in a number (size in pixels) or using a number and a % sign to indicate a percentage. Defaults to "33%, 33%, 33%".

prop.caption: default
prop.description: the value that this component has when no selection is made.

prop.caption: eachvalue
prop.description: the {@link term.expression expression} that determines the value for each {@link term.datanode data nodes} in the dataset of the element.

prop.caption: value
prop.description: the value of the element that is selected.

prop.caption: selection
prop.description: the {@link term.expression expression} that determines the selection for this element. A reference to an xml nodelist can be passed as well.

prop.caption: selected
prop.description: the {@link term.expression expression} that determines the selected node for this element. A reference to an xml element can be passed as well.

prop.caption: beforeselect
prop.description: Fires before a {@link baseclass.multiselect.method.select selection} is made

prop.caption: afterselect
prop.description: Fires after a {@link baseclass.multiselect.method.select selection} is made

prop.caption: beforechoose
prop.description: Fires before a choice is made.

prop.caption: afterchoose
prop.description: Fires after a choice is made.

prop.caption: indicate
prop.description: Fires when an item becomes the indicator.

prop.caption: locksuccess
prop.description: Fires when a lock request succeeds

prop.caption: lockfailed
prop.description: Fires when a lock request failes

prop.caption: unlocksuccess
prop.description: Fires when an unlock request succeeds

prop.caption: unlockfailed
prop.description: Fires when an unlock request fails
